Text:
The game installs and runs on windows-7 also.
steps:
1. Install game (from mm7_disk1)
2. Run mm710-11 (is an official patch for upgrading version 1.0 to version    1.1)
3) Run mm7_eng_xp

4) a)Right click on the game shortcut on desktop.
   b)select properties>compatibility tab>select "Run this program in      compatibility mode" > in the drop down list choose "windows98/windows me"

5) Mount / insert mm7_disk2

6) :)

ps: plays with all features and music.
